import React from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import useFetchProducts from '../Fetch/Product'; // Import the custom hook function ProductList() { const { categoryId } = useParams(); const { products, loading, error } = useFetchProducts(categoryId); if (loading) return
Loading...

; return (

); } export default ProductList;
